alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 08 at 10:51AM EDT until August 08 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Downeast Maine, including Hancock and Washington counties. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Multiple round of showers and storms will move into the area late this morning and continue through the evening hours. There is potential for some of these storms to track over the same areas multiple times. This could cause localized flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
